title: Four Opinion Writers on How the G.O.P. Fringe Took Over American Politics

sentence: But if you disagree with me, my doors always open.? Governors like Brian Kemp of Georgia and Ron DeSantis of Florida have said relatively little on the issue since the draft opinion came out.
title: G.O.P. Lawmakers Recast Abortion Stance, Wary of Voter Backlash
